basics.name: Salina Thongsisavath
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2026.

highlights: Assisted customers by providing information and resolving any complaints
Prepared a variety of foods and beverages according to customers
Operate restaurant's computer systems and administer payments
Collaborated with students to complete homework assignments, lagging skills, and correct weaknesses
Motivate students towards learning and studying to build strong foundation
Subjects ranged from Algebra I to Calculus I
Introduce team to Flutter, Dart, and GitHub
Schedule, organize, and lead team meetings
Teach middle school students basic Spanish
Inspire middle school students to take a language course in high school
Tutor high school students in Spanish
Volunteered 3x a week at a high school and community food pantry
Organize a health and wellness campaign
Update and maintain a physical/mental health and wellness blog

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit ScholarShip
awards.summary: An automatic scholarship per year for four years of undergraduate study for first-time degree-seeking students. Students must have a 3.8 GPA.

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Recognizes students with an excellent academic record, Minimumm current grade point average of 3.5 for 12 or more credits of academic coursework.
